pullrequest.title: Add backward support to ign-launch to capture backtraces.

content.raw:
With the integration test, you can remove the ASSERT\_EXIT\(\) to see what the results look like from backward: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/41/add-backward-support-to-ign-launch-to/diff#Ltest/integration/faulty\_plugins.ccT47](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/41/add-backward-support-to-ign-launch-to/diff#Ltest/integration/faulty_plugins.ccT47)  
  
Currently this is testing that the test throws a segfault and then has some expected content, and will suppress the actual backward stacktrace.
